site.title: Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations
site.description: Official website of Shenzhen Middle School Model United Nations Association

hero.title_line2: Model United Nations Association Welcomes You
hero.description: As one of the most influential student organizations at Shenzhen Middle School, we are committed to cultivating young talents with international perspectives, outstanding leadership, and profound humanistic literacy. Through Model United Nations conferences and international exchanges, we provide students with a professional platform to explore international affairs and exercise diplomatic skills.

home.news2_desc: "Progress comes from persistence." To better introduce PPRDMUN 2025, we specially launched an interview series, inviting the organizing committee to elaborate on the conference design concept and provide an overall introduction to the academic design.
home.news3_desc: PPRDMUN 2025 First Announcement ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡³ Contains conference setup, academic team registration, school and individual registration/academic test
home.news4_desc: The 16th Pan-Pearl River Delta Model United Nations Conference is now open for registration. Students from all schools are welcome to participate. Please download the relevant application forms and submit them before the deadline.
